title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Introducing our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! This beautiful and convenient holiday decoration is designed with our elderly customers in mind, ensuring ease of use and accessibility for those who may be easily confused.

Our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set features a wreath with a diameter of 23.6 inches and a garland length of 8.8 feet. It is adorned with a variety of festive components, including snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches.

The set comes with 100 LED warm lights, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere. These lights are battery-powered, requiring 3 AA batteries, and feature a convenient timer function that automatically turns them on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

Assembly is hassle-free, as no assembly is required. The materials used are of sturdy high quality, hypoallergenic, and feature fireproof pins, ensuring safety and durability. You can enjoy this wreath and garland set both indoors and outdoors, making it versatile and suitable for various locations such as walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows.

With its strong and durable construction, our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set requires minimal maintenance and will never fade. You won't need to worry about watering or replacing flowers. It will bring joy and holiday spirit year after year.

To provide our customers with peace of mind, we offer a generous warranty period of 365 days. Our customer service is available 24 hours a day, ensuring that any questions or concerns you may have will be promptly addressed.

Get into the festive spirit and brighten up your home with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Don't miss out on this delightful and hassle-free holiday decoration!
